description:
Stretchy and slim-fit merino wool boxer briefs made with their Cool-Lite™ fabric, the Anatomica Cool-Lite™ Trunks offer the support and comfort you need. They feature ultralight 155gm Cool-Lite™ fabric, a breathable merino wool blend that manages moisture away from your skin. The slim fit includes a supportive, contoured pouch and flatlock seams prevent chafing.

Silky-soft merino and TENCEL®, sourced from sustainable eucalyptus plantations, combine to create icebreaker Cool-Lite™, a luxurious fabric that naturally regulates your body’s microclimate. Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker Anatomica Cool-Lite Trunks - Mens

specs.value: 50% Merino Wool, 33% Lyocell, 12% Nylon, 5% Elastane - Exclusive of decoration
